template_input_params.name: vsphere_server
template_input_params.label: vSphere Server
template_input_params.description: IP address of the vSphere server

template_input_params.name: allow_unverified_ssl
template_input_params.label: Allow unverified SSL
template_input_params.description: Allows terraform vsphere provider to communicate with vsphere servers with self signed certificates

template_input_params.name: vsphere_datacenter
template_input_params.label: vSphere Datacenter
template_input_params.description: Name of the vSphere Datacenter to deploy to

template_input_params.name: vsphere_cluster
template_input_params.label: vSphere Cluster
template_input_params.description: Name of vsphere cluster to deploy to

template_input_params.name: vsphere_resource_pool
template_input_params.label: vSphere Resource Pool
template_input_params.description: Path of resource pool to deploy to

template_input_params.name: datastore_cluster
template_input_params.label: Datastore Cluster
template_input_params.description: Name of datastore cluster to use for the VMs

template_input_params.name: folder
template_input_params.label: Folder
template_input_params.description: Name of VM Folder to provision the new VMs in. The folder will be created if it doesn't exist

template_input_params.name: team_number
template_input_params.label: Team Number
template_input_params.description: Please enter your Team Number

template_input_params.name: network_label
template_input_params.label: Network Label
template_input_params.description: Name or label of network to provision VMs on. All VMs will be provisioned on the same network

template_input_params.name: template
template_input_params.label: Image Template
template_input_params.description: Name of template or VM to clone for the VM creations

template_input_params.name: instance_name
template_input_params.label: Instance Name
template_input_params.description: The prefix that will be assigned to the VM's name

template_input_params.name: domain
template_input_params.label: Domain Name
template_input_params.description: Specify domain name to be used for linux customization on the VMs

template_input_params.name: staticipblock
template_input_params.label: Static IP Block
template_input_params.description: Specify start unused static ip cidr block to assign IP addresses to the cluster, e.g. 172.16.0.0/16

template_input_params.name: staticipblock_offset
template_input_params.label: Static IP Block Offset
template_input_params.description: Specify the starting offset of the staticipblock to begin assigning IP addresses from.  e.g. with staticipblock 172.16.0.0/16, offset of 10 will cause IP address assignment to begin at 172.16.0.11

template_input_params.name: gateway
template_input_params.label: Gateway
template_input_params.description: Default gateway for the newly provisioned VMs. Leave blank to use DHCP

template_input_params.name: netmask
template_input_params.label: Netmask
template_input_params.description: Netmask in CIDR notation when using static IPs. For example 16 or 24. Set to 0 to retrieve from DHCP

template_input_params.name: dns_servers
template_input_params.label: DNS Servers
template_input_params.description: DNS Servers to configure on VMs

template_input_params.name: camlab
template_input_params.label: Camlab
template_input_params.description: Virtual Machine Resources

template_input_params.name: ssh_user
template_input_params.label: SSH User
template_input_params.description: Username which terraform will use to connect to newly created VMs during provisioning

template_input_params.name: ssh_password
template_input_params.label: SSH Password
template_input_params.description: Password which terraform will use to connect to newly created VMs during provisioning

template_input_params.name: ssh_keyfile
template_input_params.label: SSH Keyfile
template_input_params.description: Location of private ssh key to connect to newly created VMs during provisioning
